name: A Hole in the Sky
description:
Last year, 24 children were tragically lost during a field trip due to the neglect of their teacher. This is a game about remembering them.

This puzzle visual novel was made in Ren'Py for the 2023 O2A2Q Jam and thus was designed around the jam's rules: 1000 words, 1 sprite, 1 background, 1 background sound, and 1 sound effect. It is a logic puzzle where you attempt to identify the each student based on the information given. This may be a tough task for some, but I encourage you to give it your best shot.

Unfortunately, a web build cannot be given at this time. Please use the download links below if you would like to play.

If you are a fellow jam participant, good luck! I can't wait to see what creative ideas you come up with.

This game uses modified assets borrowed from the creative commons. More information can be found in the game's About page.
